meanings.sent1: The mayor was reelected for another term in office.
meanings.sent2: The president was reelected by a large majority of voters.
meanings.sent3: The cat reelected to nap in the sunniest spot in the house.
meanings.sent4: The flowers reelected to bloom in the springtime.
meanings.sent5: The student council reelected their president with a big celebration.

meanings.definition: To choose for a further term in office.
meanings.sent1: The governor was reelected to serve another four years.
meanings.sent2: The prime minister was reelected by the people for a second term.
meanings.sent3: The cookies reelected to stay fresh in the airtight container.
meanings.sent4: The sun reelected to shine brightly in the clear blue sky.
meanings.sent5: The committee reelected their chairperson to lead them through the next project.
